name: Easter Dress Up Game
description:
Easter game dress up chicks and chicken

Simple and interesting game on the Easter theme.
Distinctive features of this game:

• beautiful graphics;

• pleasant music;

• Intuitive interface;

• lack of aggression;

• Lack of purchases.

Game rules: click on the red buttons with images of objects (flowers, eggs, clothes). Chicken and chicken change clothes, flowers in the clearing change too. Easter eggs change in the basket. It's a game for girls, but boys can play this game too. A suitable game for those who like to dress up fairy-tale characters.
